Prepare workspace:

## Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(skimr)
library(summarytools)
```

## Read the data

```{r}
dfa= read_excel("CU_ACAD_DEPT_ENRL.xlsx") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
skim(dfa)
```
```{r}
dfa %>% group_by(subject) %>% skim()
```
```{r}
dfa %>% dfSummary()
```


```{r }
dfa %>% dfSummary() %>% view()
```


```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
print(dfSummary(dfa, graph.magnif = 0.75), method = 'render')
```
